name: Peatix, Inc.
description: Developer of a global event discovery platform designed to connect individuals with experiences across diverse categories, fostering shared passions and building vibrant communities. The company's platform offers a seamless search and ticketing experience for thousands of events, from art exhibitions and live music to workshops and conferences, enabling businesses to discover new interests, connect with like-minded individuals, and participate in unforgettable experiences.
